sentences.sContent: An experiment into connecting the Web with language.
sentences.sContent_eng: An experiment into connecting the Web with language.
sentences.sCn: 一个使用自然语言连接网络的试验.

sentences.sContent: On the other hand, the service might have problems connecting to the queue manager or accessing its initiation queue.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the other hand, the service might have problems connecting to the queue manager or accessing its initiation queue.
sentences.sCn: 另一方面，此服务可能拥有连接到队列管理器或访问其发起队列的相关问题。

sentences.sContent: You can connect the speakers to your CD player.
sentences.sCn: 你可以将这些扬声器与你的激光唱机连接起来。

sentences.sContent: I connected the wires for the transformer.
sentences.sCn: 我给变压器接上了电线。

phrases.pCn: 连接杆；可拆链环；连接环节；联接链节；连接片
连接终端，接头子；连接触点；夹具
连接棒；连接杆；连接杠杆

trans.tranOther: If something or someone connects one thing to another, or if one thing connects to another, or if two things connect, the two things are joined together
